description:
The Difficult Child (DC) subscale is based on 12 items from Parenting Stress Index Fourth Edition Short Form. DC subscore measures a parent's view of his/her child's temperament, defiance, non-compliance, and demandingness. Each item is scored on a 5 point scale (from 1-5). Percentile between 16% to 84% = normal ranges, between 85% to 89%: high levels, greater than or equal to 90%: clinically significant. [Abidin, R. R. (1995). Parenting Stress Index, Third Edition: Professional Manual. Odessa, FL: Psychological Assessment Resources, Inc.](https://www.parinc.com/products/pkey/335)

[Search for all PSI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=psi)
